creator: Gameberry Labs+
descriptionHtml:
"The Mayor of Towntale is missing! The town folks are without their chief, can you help them survive this crisis and solve the mystery of missing Mayor?
Come play Merge Towntale, a game of building your town and helping the folks as you investigate the mystery!

Lily is living far off from her town in a metropolitan city without a worry in the world, till one day a letter arrives from Towntale.
The letter is from the police telling her that her grandpa, the Mayor of the town is missing and they need her help with the investigation. She remembers how she used to watch and learn from her grandpa, as he build the town, from farmlands and bakery to schools and post offices.
She goes running back to her town, she takes up the responsibility of helping the town by becoming the new Mayor. She is trying to help the town by meeting their daily needs as well as help the town grow in her grandpa's absence.

Can Lily survive this and make sure the town keeps on growing? Can she be the Mayor Towntale needs in this hour of trouble? Will she be able to uncover the secret behind her grandpa's disappearance?
Find out by playing Merge Towntale, a whole new experience of merge puzzle games with a touch of mystery to it.


Match & Merge
- Discover new items and objects to match and interact with
- Freedom to move stuff around using your own sense of creativity
- Merge objects to make turn land fertile and evolve them into new and bigger objects

Discover & Grow
- Use the objects you discover and harvest to create new farms and bakery
- Get rewards and coins to upgrade and decorate your town with new buildings
- Level up to attract new people to the town to help it grow

Harvest & Deliver
- Harvest more and more objects to deliver to the town
- Make deliveries to the town folk to earn energy and coins"
descriptionShort: Towntale is without its Mayor. Can you help find him as you look after the town?

appDetails.developerAddress: Golden Tower, #697, 12th Cross, 27th Main, HSR Layout, Sector 1 Bangalore - 560102 Karnataka, India
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: A major revamp to the original game. In Merge Towntale there will be merging combined with town building flow. This will be a vastly more immersive experience compared to the previous version. So wear your mayor hat and get ready to serve the needs of the town while you solve the mysterious disappearance of your grandpa.
